children.title: Printing Problems
children.content:
Print Troubleshooter

This troubleshooter helps you solve problems with printing.

What type of problem are you having?

  • My document didn't print at all.
  • Graphics are distorted or incomplete.
  • Fonts are missing or do not appear as they do on the screen.
